definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
dark and uninhabited (idiom); remote and deserted/God-forsaken

sentences.english: The region is uninhabited except for a few scattered mountain villages.
sentences.chinese: 的小山村之外，這個地區杳無人煙。

sentences.english: What I remember is that this town used to be a no-man place.
sentences.chinese: 我記得這個城市過去是個荒無人煙的地方。

sentences.english: When she was dropped off on an oblong island with no other inhabitants.
sentences.chinese: 她在一個荒無人煙的長方形小島下了飛機。

sentences.english: Violence breeds in densely populated areas.
sentences.chinese: 暴行常發生在人煙稠密的地區。

sentences.english: Parts of the landscape, such as the Northeast New Territories, are still wild, beautiful, and basically uninhabited.
sentences.chinese: 新界東北岸等地現在仍是一派杳無人煙的天然美景。

sentences.english: On his way, Jada stopped for a night in a deserted place.
sentences.chinese: 在回家路上，加達在一處荒無人煙之地住了一夜。

sentences.english: Along the densely Lushui very little heavy but Lushui poisonous miasma .
sentences.chinese: 瀘水一帶人煙極少，瘴氣很重而且瀘水有毒。

sentences.english: At the heart of Afghanistan is an empty space a striking absence where the larger of the colossal Bamian Buddhas once stood.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗的腹地是一塊空曠之地，人煙稀少。

sentences.english: Vast areas are arid or semi-desert, and virtually uninhabited.
sentences.chinese: 大片地區都是乾旱或者半沙漠，人跡罕至，渺無人煙。

sentences.english: The little village, where I spent my happy childhood, is now deserted.
sentences.chinese: 我度過快樂童年的小村莊，如今已杳無人煙。

sentences.english: Hanging out with little friends to some desolated places.
sentences.chinese: 和一兩個朋友去人煙稀少的地方。

sentences.english: km land area. Parts of the landscape, such as the Northeast New Territories, are still wild, beautiful, and basically uninhabited.
sentences.chinese: 新界東北岸等地現在仍是一派杳無人煙的天然美景。

sentences.english: Violent winds threatened2 to shove the climbers off into oblivion.
sentences.chinese: 狂暴的風幾乎要把登山者推入渺無人煙的深淵。

sentences.english: In these crowded centers, the labor movement took form.
sentences.chinese: 在這些人煙稠密的城市中，勞工運動逐漸形成。

sentences.english: No human habitation in the wetland, I use the truth to find your shadow.
sentences.chinese: 在這片荒無人煙的溼地，我用真情尋覓到了你的身影。

sentences.english: In this place ten miles around there is no signs of human habitation.
sentences.chinese: 在這一地方的十英里的周圍內杳無人煙。
